TextView.value: * Welcome to Mali's Chess *
* QUICK START GUIDE *
1) Target a person and press 'Challenge'
2) Other person can accept / deny requests
3) Place or pickup the board by pressing ctrl+e
(the host can always relocate the board)
4) To pickup or place a piece, stay close
to it press shift+e
5) Pressing 'Forfeit' will end the match
* TIPS *
- This plugin uses chat proximity and shouting,
both players should stay close to one another
- Don't spam to prevent chat flood protection
- Both players can even change zones, the
board will stay saved until the match ends
- If you are in a match, you cant accept other
matches until the current one is forfeited.
- The host is always color white
- Report bugs to: Pixelmania#0349
~ Made with AOSharp
